belongs_to_collection.name: V.I.P. Cop. New Year's Eve Mayhem Collection

overview: The new year is approaching, and Barvikha’s police department is planning to celebrate it outside the city in the warm company of old friends and colleagues. But unforeseen circumstances in the person of criminals who robbed a large jewelry company, put the holiday at risk. Will the Rublev police be able to return the stolen gems worth millions of dollars and save their holiday before the clock strikes midnight?
title: V.I.P. Cop. New Year's Eve Mayhem 2
